body:
Hi, I'm trying to run the OUT_SET calculation using the Ladybug_PMV Comfort Calculator but I'm getting an error message saying 'The calculation has been terminated by the user!'. I'm using a weather file from Doha, Qatar with a metabolic rate of 1.4 and clothing index of 0.9. The component works when met is reduced to 1.0 so I assume there's an out of range number being calculated somewhere in the code. I've updated the component to the 28th February version as referenced in this thread: [http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/set-comfort...](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/set-comfort-error-when-analysis-period-grater-than-5-months) Any ideas why the code is rejecting the inputs? Thanks,

Dan.
